cont.entity_a: The right side speaker stopped working after five months, indicating poor longevity. Right headphone stopped working after eight months.
The headphones are uncomfortable due to the shrinking head pad and sweaty ear cups during extended use. Comfortable and durable for long-term use. Headphones are lightweight with low ear fatigue.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable to wear for extended periods. Ear holes are small and uncomfortable. Hard clamp can cause discomfort and headaches.

cont.entity_a: Audio performance is outstanding with effective noise-cancellation. High notes are muted, affecting sound quality. Good low end and dynamic range. Excellent sound with noise cancellation and soft cushions. Sound spectrum is enhanced with an audio amplifier. Sound is shallow and low volume when directly connected to a smartphone. Sound quality is impressive with clear bass. Sound quality is excellent for the price. Sound is excellent but durability is poor. Sound quality is great with a natural sound. Sound quality is great for audio design. Sound quality is good but lacks deep bass. Sound quality is impressive with good frequency response.
cont.entity_b: Sound is crisp and clean. Balanced high and mid-section with decent lows. Bass is weak and distorts at high volumes. Sound quality is good for portable use.

cont.entity_a: Noise cancellation is not sufficient for drumming.
Sound isolation quality is disappointing. Headphones fit well and offer good noise isolation. Noise isolation is impressive. Sound isolation is excellent.

The headband lining started cracking and flaking off quickly. Durability is questionable as one speaker stopped working after six months. Material of ear padding is prone to failure. Durability issues with plastic construction.
cont.entity_b: Build quality is poor with weak plastic construction. Plastic construction may break easily. Sound quality is good but durability is poor.

cont.entity_a: Coiled cord is heavy and awkward to manage. Cord is heavy and coiled, making it inconvenient.
